questions.question: You feel drowsy when driving. You should:
choices: Stop and rest as soon as possible and make sure you have a good supply of fresh air
Close the car windows to help you concentrate
Turn the air-condition on to keep you cool and comfortable
questions.answer: Stop and rest as soon as possible and make sure you have a good supply of fresh air

questions.question: What is the color of the pavement marking that separates a multiple lane highway?
What should you do when preparing for a turn?
choices: Fully stop six meters from the corner

questions.question: Is it true that student drivers are exempted from traffic violations?
choices: True, violation tickets will be issued against instructors
False, violation tickets will be issued against student driver
False, violation tickets can only be issued to professional drivers
questions.answer: False, violation tickets will be issued against student driver

questions.question: The most effective way to deal with tailgater is to:
choices: Slow down and let him pass
Increase your speed and be alert on your brakes
Ignore him but do not allow him to get away
questions.answer: Slow down and let him pass

questions.question: If you see a ball coming from behind a parked vehicle on a city street, chances are a kid is following it. What will you do?
choices: Blow your horn and maintain speed

questions.question: In a roundabout (rotonda), which has the first priority?
choices: The vehicles facing the green light

questions.question: At a stop line before a crosswalk, a driver is always expected to:

If you park on the roadway side of a parked vehicle, then:
choices: You are obliged to pay thrice the parking fee
You are supposed to pay twice the parking fee of the parked vehicle
You are obstructing the flow of traffic
questions.answer: You are obstructing the flow of traffic

questions.question: When taking medication that may affect your driving, you should:
choices: Ask a friend or relative for advice
Ask your doctor and check the medicine label
questions.answer: Ask your doctor and check the medicine label

questions.question: Road rage among motorists arises when:
choices: Either of the party provokes the other
Neither of the party provokes the other
Neither of the party knows traffic rules and regulations
questions.answer: Either of the party provokes the other

questions.question: Where may you overtake on a one way street?
choices: Either on the right or the left
questions.answer: Either on the right or the left

questions.question: Which of the following is a violation of disregarding traffic signals?

choices: Be alert and be ready to slow down or stop if necessary
questions.answer: Be alert and be ready to slow down or stop if necessary

questions.question: What should you not do when passing a hospital zone?
When can you use your mobile phone while driving?
choices: When the vehicle is in motion
When stopping on a safe side of the road
questions.answer: When stopping on a safe side of the road

questions.question: The rightmost lane of a three-lane expressway should be for:
What does a flashing yellow/amber light mean?
choices: Slow down and proceed with caution
questions.answer: Slow down and proceed with caution

questions.question: If you approach an intersection where there is no policeman on duty and no signal, you should yield right-of-way to:
You are leaving your vehicle parked on a road, when may you leave the engine running?
choices: If you will be parked for less than five minutes

questions.question: At an intersection with no traffic lights, two cars approach at right angles to each other, which driver must yield?
choices: The driver of the vehicle who arrived there first
The driver of the vehicle that slowed down first
The driver of the vehicle that arrived there last
questions.answer: The driver of the vehicle that arrived there last

questions.question: Premium gasoline provides more power but may result to:

The signal that warns the driver of hazard ahead:

choices: To warn others of your presence
To give you the right of way
questions.answer: To warn others of your presence

questions.question: At an intersection with a traffic light, make a left turn only when:
choices: The left arrow green light is on
The red is on or when the red arrow is on
The vehicles going straight have passed
questions.answer: The left arrow green light is on

questions.question: You can overtake on a highway if it has two lanes with:
DL is for driver's license while VIN is for?
When motorists flash their headlights at you, it means:
choices: That they are giving way to you
That there is a radar speed trap ahead
That they are warning you of their presence
questions.answer: That they are warning you of their presence

questions.question: How do you service your brake, accelerator and clutch cable?
choices: Wash the cable with soap and water regularly
Soak the cable with engine oil regularly
Soak the cable with gasoline regularly
questions.answer: Soak the cable with engine oil regularly

questions.question: Who has the right-of-way between two vehicles coming from opposite directions on a narrow steep road?
What type of insurance is compulsory for motor vehicles?
You notice that your vehicle keeps bouncing when you step on the brake. What does this mean?
choices: Steering wheel is not located centrally

questions.question: The proper hand signal for a right turn is:
choices: Left arm held down, hand pointing at ground
Left arm at elbow, hand pointing up
questions.answer: Left arm at elbow, hand pointing up

questions.question: Which of the following is true about seat belts?
choices: Only the driver must wear a seat belt
Only the front seat passengers should wear seat belts
Seat belts are proven to save lives
questions.answer: Seat belts are proven to save lives

questions.question: What is the violation if a driver is operating a vehicle with blinking brake light?
What are the effects of alcohol/drugs?
choices: Less control, false sense of confidence and poor judgement of speed
questions.answer: Less control, false sense of confidence and poor judgement of speed

questions.question: What advice should you give to a driver who has had a few alcoholic drinks at a party?
choices: Drink a cup of coffee and then drive home
Take a rest and do not drive
questions.answer: Take a rest and do not drive

questions.question: You are driving on the expressway. You may stop only:
choices: To load or unload goods or passengers
On the lay-by to attend or call for an emergency
questions.answer: On the lay-by to attend or call for an emergency

questions.question: A sixty-year-old senior citizen files an application for a driver's license. Is this allowed?
choices: It depends if the applicant will pass the medical, theoretical and practical examination

questions.question: What flag color is required to be attached on projecting loads of vehicles?
Under the law, what other factor can affect your driving condition other than alcoholic drinks?
What does the traffic sign for 'Dangerous curve ahead' mean?
What should you do when another vehicle is following you too close?
choices: Speed up to start a road race
Slow down and give him the signal to overtake you
questions.answer: Slow down and give him the signal to overtake you

questions.question: What is the minimum safe following distance under normal conditions?
choices: A minimum of 4 seconds is the recommended following distance under most conditions
A minimum of 2 seconds is the recommended following distance under most conditions
A minimum of 3 seconds is the recommended following distance under most conditions
questions.answer: A minimum of 2 seconds is the recommended following distance under most conditions

questions.question: When parking downhill, you must:
choices: Turn your wheels towards the curb
Turn your wheels away from the curb
Turn your wheels parallel to the road
questions.answer: Turn your wheels towards the curb

questions.question: What should you do if several vehicles pass you on the left?
choices: Stop and wait for the vehicles to pass
Maintain or slightly reduce speed and keep to the right
questions.answer: Maintain or slightly reduce speed and keep to the right

questions.question: Drinking any amount of alcohol is likely to:
choices: Increase the speed of your reactions
Slow down your reactions to hazards, worsen your judgement of speed and give a false sense of confidence
questions.answer: Slow down your reactions to hazards, worsen your judgement of speed and give a false sense of confidence

questions.question: What should be the color of a brake light?
Which area is overtaking prohibited?
When can you use the first lane of a three-lane expressway?
choices: When driving below the speed limit and with no other vehicles around
When driving above the speed limit

questions.question: What is the effect of replacing the bulb of the originally installed headlights with bulb not specified by the vehicle manufacturer (e.g LED light, higher wattage)?
choices: Distracts motorists coming from opposite direction and it's against the traffic law
questions.answer: Distracts motorists coming from opposite direction and it's against the traffic law

questions.question: Before changing lanes on a highway, ideally, you must give a signal for:

choices: You are driving too fast, and you lost control of your vehicle
questions.answer: You are driving too fast, and you lost control of your vehicle

questions.question: Before changing lanes in traffic, especially at night and when it is raining aside from giving a signal and checking your side and rearview mirrors, what else do you need to do?
choices: Slightly turn your head to check other vehicles beside your car
questions.answer: Slightly turn your head to check other vehicles beside your car

questions.question: Most school service transport-related deaths and injuries occur when:
choices: Children cross the street after being discharged from the school service
Children are being discharged from the school service within the school campus
Children are being loaded into the school service within the school campus
questions.answer: Children cross the street after being discharged from the school service

questions.question: Who has the priority right-of-way?
choices: Fire truck with flashing light and siren responding to an emergency
questions.answer: Fire truck with flashing light and siren responding to an emergency

questions.question: On toll gates, a red X light/sign means that:
choices: You cannot drive on this lane
You may drive on this lane
You must move out of this lane
questions.answer: You cannot drive on this lane

questions.question: What else can seriously affect your concentration other than alcohol drinks?
choices: Traffic lights, comfortable seats, good road design
Drugs, tiredness and loud music, billboards, tinted windows
Soothing music, properly lit streets, pavement markings
questions.answer: Drugs, tiredness and loud music, billboards, tinted windows

questions.question: You see a school bus parked with its hazard warning lights flashing on the other side of the highway. Are you required to stop?
choices: Yes, you must stop, but you can then proceed when you deem it to be safe
Yes, you need to stop until the hazard lights stop flashing and there are no children on the road
No, but you need to slow down
questions.answer: No, but you need to slow down

questions.question: Flashing yellow traffic lights means:
choices: You have the right-of-way over a flashing red light
Slow down and proceed with caution
Vehicles will be crossing from the other side
questions.answer: Slow down and proceed with caution

questions.question: Upon approaching an intersection, what should you do if you found out that the roadway beyond is blocked with traffic?
choices: Keep as close as possible to the car ahead
Proceed slowly into the intersection until the traffic ahead moves on
Stop before the intersection and wait until the traffic ahead moves on
questions.answer: Stop before the intersection and wait until the traffic ahead moves on

questions.question: This is an important safety accessory of a vehicle when you are leaving your vehicle:
To drive on the road, one must have these documents ready:
choices: DL and Registration and insurance policy
Valid DL and updated registration and insurance policy
questions.answer: Valid DL and updated registration and insurance policy

questions.question: When you see a traffic light change from yellow, what color should you expect next?
Which place should you not overtake without a clear vision at least 200 feet ahead?
choices: At the foot of the bridge

questions.question: Overtaking upon a crest approaching a bridge is prohibited, unless:
choices: The driver's view can be clearly seen at a minimum distance of 100 meters
The driver's view can be clearly seen at a minimum distance of 150 meters
The driver's view can be clearly seen at a minimum distance of 75 meters
questions.answer: The driver's view can be clearly seen at a minimum distance of 150 meters

questions.question: A single yellow line means:
Are you allowed to turn right at red signal?
choices: Yes, this is a protected turn, so you will have the right-of-way
Yes, you can but only after coming to a stop and yielding to traffic
Yes, you can but only if a sign permits you to do so. The signal may be 'turn right with care on red signal after full stop'
questions.answer: Yes, you can but only if a sign permits you to do so. The signal may be 'turn right with care on red signal after full stop'

questions.question: Among the list, who are exempted from speed limits?
choices: Doctors and their drivers going to an emergency
Drivers of high ranking officials of the government
questions.answer: Doctors and their drivers going to an emergency

questions.question: Which of the following accessory is mandatory to keep in good condition?

choices: Wait and see which lane is moving faster

questions.answer: Move to the right with care

questions.question: While driving, how should you look at your side and rear view mirrors?
choices: Not less than once per minute

questions.question: What should you do when passing a school zone?

choices: Position your vehicle in the center lane

questions.question: Which of the following will improve fuel consumption?
choices: Short journeys with a cold engine
Reducing your speed, proper braking and planning well ahead
questions.answer: Reducing your speed, proper braking and planning well ahead

questions.question: Would you maintain your speed if an emergency vehicle is approaching from behind with a siren and flashing lights even if there is another lane open?
choices: Yes, to avoid inconvenience to yourself
Depending on the ability of the driver

choices: Stopping and unloading passengers on pedestrian lane
questions.answer: Stopping and unloading passengers on pedestrian lane

questions.question: What should you do if you are in an intersection and you hear a siren behind you?
choices: Continue through the intersection, then pull over and allow the emergency vehicle to pass through
Stop and do not move until the emergency vehicle has passed
Back up and pull over to the right side of the road and stop
questions.answer: Continue through the intersection, then pull over and allow the emergency vehicle to pass through

questions.question: You parked facing down a steep hill. If you drive an automatic, you should leave your car in 'park'. What gear should you use with a manual?
choices: Leave the car in first gear

questions.question: Is it true that you can park beside a fire hydrant anytime?

False, a fire hydrant is for ambulance only
False, only emergency vehicles are allowed to park beside the fire hydrant
questions.answer: False, a fire hydrant is an emergency facility, no one is allowed to park beside it
